title: T206 Graded Hall of famer and rare backs Part 2
author: piedmont150

posts.post_title: T206 Graded Hall of famer and rare backs Part 2
posts.post_content:
I have the following t206 for sale all prices include shipping and insurance

Hickman SL PSA 4 nice centering clean OLD MILL back scratch on front, I can't tell if it is the holder or card. Nice card.  175.00

McCauley SL OLD Mill SGC 40 Beautiful coloring and centering slight scratch on pocket , hard to see.. Nice card for the grade  120.00

Kiernan SL SGC 40 Piedmont, Nice color couple of small wrinkles 120.00

Hart  SL SGC 40 OLD MILL nice card couple of wrinkles 120.00

ELBERFIELD WASHington PSA 1.5 Paper loss and glue on reverse ( not too bad) Front looks beautiful ( NO CREASES) and like a PSA 5, Gorgeous card on front. Affordable toughie.  350.00

Jordan SL HINDU  SGC 20. Nice for the grade tough to find, great color, tape mark on back and some minor creases.  Very tough!   300.00

Willis Portrait, Stunning color, SGC 50  Sweet Cap 150 Nice centering   160.00

Evers Green Portrait, SGC 30 glue stain on back NO CREASES great color, another affordable card.   125.00

I have scans for every card please IM or e-mail me at ddm4236@comcast.net with interest and I'll shoot out the scans to you.
Thanks all
Evers  Portrait has been sold, all others still available

Hickman And Evers sold all other cards available.

Thanks
